visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with a plot background image. The chart should have a title, styled axes and labels, a single data series, and custom colors. Additionally, configure the chart with specific margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a line chart with a plot background image. The chart title is styled with a dark color and a larger font size for better visibility. The x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with a medium gray color and a standard font size, ensuring clarity. The y-axis also includes a title for context. The data series is named 'Data Series 1' and uses a dark gray color for the data points. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. Additional configurations include disabling the credits and setting the series markers to be invisible, providing a cleaner visual appearance.
